root: ^"Who wants their hand bitten off? I was asleep!"
^"Magnus informed me that thau be me familiar and would help with alchemy"
^The capybara looked disconsolate, but his squeaky voice lacked any threat.
^"I am pleased to make your acquaintance, sir."
^"Yeah, I'd also be pleased to meet such a magnificent creature like myself."
^"I hope our journey will be fruitful."
^"You're a nice kid; you actually don't annoy me that much. If you'll treat me like the king I am, then we'll be good."
^I bowed down to the animal: capybaras reign on human lands?
^"No, of course not. Are you dense?"
^I couldn't comprehend what the animal was talking about. I didn't have enough time to dwell on it as the large rodent approached me, continuing his monologue.

^"Hey, if you want to go with me, remember I won't coddle you. And the world isn't a great place; it's terrible, actually. Famine, wars, sickness—yet royalty lives without any problems. They're leeches!"
^I understood that Magibara wanted me to know his expectations. I stared at the rodent, expecting it to continue, but it didn't.
